thread.title: White House defends security clearance process on Porter

title: White House defends security clearance process on Porter
text:
White House defends security clearance process on Porter 5:05pm EST - 01:23 
The White House on Tuesday defended its handling of the background check for a former top aide accused of domestic abuse by two ex-wives despite contradictory comments by the head of the FBI earlier in the day. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
